title: I think i ate off icecream
body: Does this happen, bc I feel shit

replies.body: Ice cream naturally makes you feel like shit anyway because of all the chemicals used like preservatives and anti-freeze etc etc. But unless the ice cream is like a year old I'd say you just need to cleanse

"Natural" icecream is worse.
Lactose intolerant here. Can't stand three scoops without some tilactase integrator.
:/

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=exM5y2UE,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-25T20:15:26.229+0000)
>
> "Natural" icecream is worse.
> Lactose intolerant here. Can't stand three scoops without some tilactase integrator.
> :/

Get coconut ice-cream, very expensive but worth it.
http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2015/05/21/best-vanilla-ice-cream-supermarket_n_7372888.html?ir=Good+News&ncid=fcbklnkushpmg00000023 here's a good vid that'll teach you a few things..
I'll have to try that.. Where can you buy it?

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=exM5y2UE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-25T19:27:06.533+0000)
>
> Ice cream naturally makes you feel like shit anyway because of all the chemicals used like preservatives and anti-freeze etc etc. But unless the ice cream is like a year old I'd say you just need to cleanse

Yeah I know what you are talking about, I don't do well with preservatives and often avoid them, however putting them in food has become such common practise nowadays shopping for me takes nearly twice as long making sure there isn't something bad they just renamed to sound like a vitamin or protein :/

What do you use for cleansing? I just go for vital greens and turmeric with an assortment of other stuff I feel I need in the morning and put it all into a blender

I use a health shop called neways.. I have green qi which consists of spirulina and kale and a crazy amount of other greens and a few other things that I can go into depth if you ask like mineral drink and all the vitamins in pill form. One more thing that might be a vital factor.. Your gut health. I take something called Lacto Flora which is literally good bacteria in a satchel with the food they need.. Take one every 2 days or so and you will feel healthier. Everything starts in the gut

> [{quoted}](name=VENI VIDI VICI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=exM5y2UE,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-26T11:03:48.224+0000)
>
> I use a health shop called neways.. I have green qi which consists of spirulina and kale and a crazy amount of other greens and a few other things that I can go into depth if you ask like mineral drink and all the vitamins in pill form. One more thing that might be a vital factor.. Your gut health. I take something called Lacto Flora which is literally good bacteria in a satchel with the food they need.. Take one every 2 days or so and you will feel healthier. Everything starts in the gut

Actually the best thing that a gut can get is greek yogurt (unsweetened of course, sugar overworks the immune system so bad bacteria doesn't feed off it) because 80% of any greek yougurt you buy is natural it is the safest option in the supermarket for you to have.

The reason its good? Bacteria in your gut reproduces like mad in it.

Also I shop at a few places, chief among them is a farmers market 2 hours away which can sell all kinds of stuff depending on the day and go vita. I mainly hit go vita just because of the gluten free options of stuff that is never gluten free but also I get vital greens and fish oil there (the big brands' stuff that I can't get at the market). All my vegetables and greens I get from the market


Cocconut icecream is sold everywhere really but best places are natural health food stores that are allowed to stock them

I once ate out Icecream, but never off Icecream.

At least, I think that's what she said her name was.
I did that once, spent the day on the toilet, goodluck OP.
